text: The sun is almost up. Smog clearing. A small PRIVATE PLAN comes in for a landing.

As the plane touches down, we see A BLACK SUV, A THUG on MOTORCYCLE (we'll call him PONCH), and two other men awaiting. As the three men on the ground look on, the plane taxis t stop, kills its engine. Silence, then -- We hear SOMETHING - is that MUSIC? Ever so faint. It soun a little like Pantera’s “Cowboys from Hell.” The bodyguar turn to see -- Across the airfield, in the distance - TAYLOR'S CAR. Screaming towards them. And we can really start to hear i now, the PANTERA. We stay behind THE BODYGUARDS as they raise SCOPED ASSAUL RIFLES; shoulder them. The car shrieks closer. The bodyguards take AIM and FIRE off a volley of shots. BLAM. BLAM. BLAM. BLAM. BLAM. The CAR gets HIT! It flips over several times, lands on i side in the dirt, a couple hundred yards away. The bodyguards and Ponch look to each other, as, BEHIND

That was a rough one. I hate these little planes. Guys! You're not gonna believe this. The pilot is from the same village as my grandfather in Bolivia - fucking crazy right? Then...he sees the cloud of dust billowing from the crash car. (CONTINUED )
